comments:
In the UI, we don't allow the user to delete an agent if it's still attached or 
monitoring. However, it is possible to have a terminated agent that is still 
collecting. The UI will allow you to delete such agents, causing an exception 
to be printed to stdout (but otherwise no error symptoms). We should prevent 
the user from deleting such agents.

Here's the stack trace:

Save action should be disabled only when the agent is collecting data.
If the agent is active, the client should be detached before delete
